How to take advantage of hexagonal architecture for Badoom extraction?

2024-06-18T11:00:00Z

With the Badoom sunset, migration of big scope can be a nightmare. Any little feature can quickly require to extract a big block at the same time, and we donâ€™t want to stop developing new features. We will share with you how we used the hexagonal architecture of our service to allow an iterative and risk-free extraction.
